scripts.dev: bun run cleanup && concurrently --kill-others "bun run dev:server" "bun run dev:voice" "bun run dev:client"
scripts.dev:with-ngrok: bun run cleanup && concurrently --kill-others "bun run dev:server" "bun run dev:voice" "bun run dev:client" "bun run dev:ngrok"
scripts.install:all: bun install && cd client && bun install && cd ../server && bun install
